text: I like connecting new technology to legacy technology. Am I in the right place ?

I had set up this channel for some work Laszlo was doing with z, OMF internship.. its wrapping up now.. but I do work on mainframes ("legacy" is a term I term try not to take as an insult since I insist I work on cutting edge stuff! :wink: ) :slightly_smiling_face:
what in particular are you interested in?
